select m.date , m.time, l.gu, m.isBooked,m.formCode, c.name from matching m left outer join court c on m.courtID = c.courtID left outer join location l on m.locationID = l.locationID
where l.gu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gu},'%') and m.date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{date},'%') and m.time=#{time} and m.isBooked =#{isBooked} and m.formCode = #{formCode}
